DOC.brief_title: T-provisional Stenting v Mini-Crush Chronic Total Occlusions ( CTO )
DOC.criteria: Patients consider coronary angioplasty stenting due Ischemic heart disease ( Stable angina , Unstable angina , nonST Myocardial Infarction ) . Bifurcation side branch diameter > 2 mm CTO segment , verify coronary angiography Successful CTO recanalization Signed , document informed consent prior admission study Age < 18 year > 75 year Left main artery bifurcation lesion Reocclusion CTOs Renal insufficiency ( GFR/MDRD < 30 ml/min ) Subject platelet count < 100,000 cells/mm3 > 700,000 cells/mm3 . Known nonadherence double antiplatelet therapy ( DAPT ) LVEF < 30 % Continuing bleed Acute coronary syndrome ( STelevation Myocardial infarction ) Anamnesis previous CABG Pregnancy
